title: THE MOST DELICIOUS SINGLE
description: The most delicious burger! And this is not a joke. Brioche bun, juicy beef patty, fresh tomatoes, lettuce leaves, pickled cucumbers, red onion, Cheddar and Mozzarella cheeses, dressing with unagi cream sauce and barbecue cream sauce — the perfect combination in one burger!

title: BBQ L
description: You haven't tried such a delicious BBQ yet! Burger with homemade bun, juicy beef patty, stretching Cheddar cheese, fried onions and fresh iceberg lettuce. A harmonious combination of barbecue ketchup sauces and 1000 islands gives piquancy to the taste.

title: SLOW L
description: Unexpected, but unforgettable! A hearty burger with a homemade brioche bun, juicy beef patty, fresh cole slow salad, with stretching Cheddar cheese, pickled cucumbers, fresh red onions and a spicy Texas sauce with a rich smoked flavor.

title: HAWAIIAN L
description: Remember a bright vacation or a sunny summer with a Hawaiian burger! Fresh bun, beef patty, a unique combination of grilled sweet pineapple, signature hawai sauce, pickled cucumbers, lettuce leaves and mozzarella cheese - very tasty!

title: MUSHROOM L
description: A fragrant burger with a signature black bun, fried mushrooms with onions in demiglas sauce, juicy beef patty, crispy turkey chips, fresh lettuce leaves and tomatoes, pickled cucumbers and fresh red onions, seasoned with a signature sauce with truffle oil.

title: CLASSIC L
description: A classic that will appeal to everyone. A signature burger with a homemade bun, juicy beef patty with slices of cheddar cheese, which perfectly complement fresh lettuce leaves, tomatoes, pickles and red onions.

title: FISHBURGER L
description: Especially for those who love fish, we have prepared a signature burger with a fluffy white bun and juicy fish fillet, cucumbers, pickled onions and fresh lettuce leaves, seasoned with tartar sauce.

title: THE MOST DELICIOUS DOUBLE
description: The most delicious burger! And this is not a joke. Brioche bun, juicy beef patty, fresh tomatoes, lettuce leaves, pickled cucumbers, red onion, Cheddar and Mozzarella cheeses, dressing with unagi cream sauce and barbecue cream sauce — the perfect combination in one burger!

title: MEGA BURGER
description: Huge, juicy, powerful burger Classic weighing 1 kilogram

title: CHICKEN SPICY
description: Spicy burger with juicy chicken strips, homemade brioche bun, hot jalapeno pepper, mozzarella cheese, pickled cucumbers and fresh iceberg lettuce, seasoned with Texas and Hawaiian sauces. 270 g .

title: THE BACHELOR BURGER
description: Homemade bun, signature sauce with truffle oil, mozzarella cheese, crispy turkey chips, primbif marbled beef patty, caesar salad, tomatoes, Moscow salad. 380 g

title: ITALIAN L
description: Enjoy the refined and balanced taste of our Italian burger. With homemade bun, juicy beef patty, iceberg salad, seasoned with caesar sauce and parmesan. Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes and a special sauce with truffle oil are added to the taste.
